verdict.summary: Scrambled eggs are generally safe for individuals with coeliac disease, provided they are prepared without gluten-containing ingredients or cross-contamination. The main risks arise from added ingredients or cooking methods that may introduce gluten.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.
